content:
Hello all
I have doubt related to the organization
Can we run more than one organization on one server
A message was moved here from #development help > I can not browse port 9991 by Lauryn Menard.

@Rohit Sopankar - Just a heads up that I moved your message to this stream and topic since it was unrelated to the previous conversation; make sure to read through the guidelines for this community.

Here's a link to the documentation on hosting multiple organization: https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/multiple-organizations.html.
